tp.pr5.userInterfaces

Class InterfaceModesAbstractFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr5.userInterfaces.InterfaceModesAbstractFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BothFactory, ConsoleFactory, MultipleGUIFactory, SimpleGUIFactory

    public abstract class InterfaceModesAbstractFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Factory to give a factory depends the interface mode which wants the user.
    Each Factory have to be able to create the view components, create the appropriate controller and associate the corresponding view elements to that controller.
    In this way, you can change or add new interface modes implementations while extends this abstract class and the app should works perfectly.
    Author:
    Abel Serrano Juste
